productName: India Gate Broken Mogra Basmati Rice
description: Convert your everyday simple recipes into a delight with long and aromatic India Gate Broken Mogra Basmati Rice, a perfect fit for everyday consumption, it is popularly used in the preparation of pulao, biryani, kheer and other delectable dishes, carefully chosen to give you an authentic taste and flavour, slender grains that add to the texture of your food, rich impeccable taste with a characteristic fragrance that lightens up your taste buds, no sticking or breakage while cooking.

Tasty and healthy, Rajdhani Daliya is a great way to keep the hunger pangs at bay while having a healthy bite in each spoon. Containing broken wheat kernels it is easy to digest and makes for a delicious meal. Great source of nutrients for the body. Made from wholesome wheat grains. Adds a nutty flavour to your dish. Blended with soups and dals to thicken the consistency.

Prepared from the finest-quality rice grains, the Rajdhani Mota Poha is widely used in Indian homes for preparing various dishes. This poha is full of nutrients and is low in fat. Hygienically packed for the highest quality and best taste. Rich source of carbohydrates, dietary fibre, vitamins, and minerals to keep the body healthy and fit. Can be used for making breakfast dishes and evening snacks.
